15g PROTEIN
Quick Bread

FLUFFY PROTEIN CLOUD BREAD

A light and airy cloud bread, perfect for a low-carb, high-protein snack. 15g of protein per serving.

15g
Protein
100
Calories
30m
Total Time
10
Yield

Nutrition per 2 pieces

Carbs2g
Fat4g
Fiber0g
Sugar1g
DifficultyMedium

INGREDIENTS

  • 3 large eggs, separated
  • 60g cream cheese, softened
  • 30g unflavored whey protein powder
  • 1/4 tsp cream of tartar

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Preheat Oven

Preheat your oven to 300¬∞F (150¬∞C).

2

Beat Egg Whites

In a clean bowl, beat the egg whites and cream of tartar until stiff peaks form.

3

Mix Yolks and Cheese

In a separate bowl, mix the egg yolks, cream cheese, and protein powder until smooth.

4

Fold Gently

Gently fold the yolk mixture into the egg whites until just combined, being careful not to deflate the whites.

5

Form and Bake

Spoon the mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper, forming small circles. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown.

6

Cool

Let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
